title: BRIEF-Main Street Announces Intention To Fully Redeem Its 6.125% Notes Due 2023
text: March 1, 2018 / 12:12 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Main Street Announces Intention To Fully Redeem Its 6.125% Notes Due 2023 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Main Street Capital Corp: * MAIN STREET ANNOUNCES INTENTION TO FULLY REDEEM ITS 6.125% NOTES DUE 2023 * MAIN STREET CAPITAL- INTENDS TO ‍REDEEM 100% OF ABOUT $90.7 MILLION (FACE VALUE) REMAINING ISSUED & OUTSTANDING AMOUNT OF CO‘S 6.125% NOTES DUE 2023​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
